description: large firework explosion in LRQ at right edge on water's edge; bridge with arches at left center; people on boats with strings of lanterns on water; two ladies in foreground at bottom center in boat
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

at bottom edge of mount, center, in pencil: [XIV] and [-2555-]; LRC on mount, in pencil: [Fumé original.  T.R. LB. 198]
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1995; sold in April for ROOO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1995-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; LRC of mount, in pencil: [Fête Vénitienne par la Seinne]
title: Venetian Festival on the Seine
